For a limited time, Kolari has the Canon RF mount clip-in filters on sale. These filters are great, especially if you have a wide variety of lens filter threads. If you do not swap filters often in the field, these are the best thing ever.

I used these for my IR-converted cameras and they work fantastic.

Kolari has an insane amount of filters available, and right now they are 20% off. Make sure you choose regular or slim filters depending on your lenses. Kolari recommends using the slim filters with the RF-S cameras. (EOS R100, EOS R50, etc)

Purchase the clip-in filters here

You need one magnetic mounting plate per camera, and then after that, you just purchase the filters you want. The magnetic mount is only $1, so it's a breeze to install and get rolling.

Kolari also has one sale for up to 40% off other deals. I have used Kolari professional filters and they are top-notch. They offer unique filters that are nearly impossible to find elsewhere.

  • Savings of up to $500 on all pre-converted cameras.
  • Savings of up to $100 off all conversions and software.

If you really love IR photography like I do, there's some converted camera deals to be had right now.

Fully converted R5 Mark II for $4599.99

Choose from many different cameras pre-converted and just waiting to find a new home.
